    Returns a new list containing all individuals (both alive and potentially dead) currently managed by this PopulationManager.
    List<Individual>
    PopulationManager.getTopK(int k)
    Retrieves the top 'k' individuals from the currently alive population, ranked by their "comfort" level in descending order (higher comfort is better).

    private int
    Reproduction_Event.gerarExpo(double mediaBase, Individual ind, Simulation_Context ctx)
    Generates a random integer from an exponential distribution, with its mean dynamically adjusted based on the individual's "comfort" level ($\phi$) and a base mean.
